full_summary:
# Dental Hygienist Services

## Contract Details

* Reference Number: `cb-9403-35179385`
* Amended Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: `21401-26-448423`
* Publication Date: Septembre 22, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: Octobre 6, 2023 (14:00 hrs)
* Amendment Date: Octobre 6, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: Octobre 20, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Octobre 19, 2026
* Tender Status: **Expired**

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* UNSPSC Classification: *85122000 - Dental Services*

## Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Correctional Service Canada
* Contact Information:
  + Name: Danielle Murdoch
  + Email: <danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca>
  + Phone: (343) 422-4831
* Contracting Entity Address:
  + Address Line 1: P.O. Box 1174, 445 Union Street West
  + City: Kingston
  + Province: Ontario
  + Postal Code: K7L 4Y8
  + Country: Canada

## Tender Description

The Correctional Service Canada is seeking a contractor to provide dental hygienist services to federal offenders at Collins Bay Institution, Warkworth Institution, Millhaven Institution, Bath Institution, and Joyceville Institution. The successful contractor will be responsible for providing dental hygiene services (cleaning and scaling) in accordance with the standards of practice set out by the College of Dental Hygienists of Ontario. The contractor must incorporate ongoing evaluation by recording and updating relevant findings on the client’s dental record for the contract dentist to review.

DOIs to download tenders: 
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9403/application-for-registration-%28471-e-%282.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9403/npp-en-dental-hygienist-retender.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9403/rfp---en---21401-26-4488423a---dental-h
